item.title: I need help please and thank you!
item.dc:creator: @The_Almost The Almost
item.description:
@The_Almost wrote:

ok now i figured out how to do this but it always says have 3 errors. can anyone help me?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 100000000); sendMessage("This is your starter pack. Enjoy your time here on Plazapkscape"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack!"); } }
